name: Vegan Refried Beans (Instant Pot, Dried Beans, Canned Tomatoes)
instructions: Turn Instant Pot to Sauté mode. Add oil, then onion and garlic. Cook until softened, about 3–4 minutes.
Add cumin, paprika, oregano, salt, and pepper. Stir for 30 seconds to bloom the spices.
Add rinsed dried beans, canned tomatoes (with juice), and 3 cups water or broth.
Cancel Sauté mode. Set Instant Pot to Manual (High Pressure) for 45 minutes.
Let pressure naturally release for 15 minutes, then manually release any remaining pressure.
If needed, drain excess liquid (save some in case you want to adjust the texture).
Mash the beans using a potato masher or immersion blender to your preferred texture.
Optional: Turn Sauté mode back on and cook mashed beans for 5–10 minutes to thicken.
Stir in lime juice if using. Taste and adjust seasoning before serving.
